title: Quantum Computers Stealing Bitcoin? Whatever. Stealing Thoughts? Un Oh
description: I looks like having a quantum computer steal your cryptocurrency will be a minor inconvenience when compared to having a quantum computer steal your thoughts.
content: LONDON, ENGLAND - JUNE 9: British Prime Minister, Keir Starmer (L) takes part in a panel discussion ... More with Jensen Huang (C), CEO of Nvidia and Poppy Gustafsson, the Minister of State for Inves… [+7240 chars]
